text: hananimkkeseo maliaui adeul yesuya nega baegseong-ege malhayeo ha nanim-eul je-oehago na yesuwa naui eomeonileul gyeongbaehala hayeossneunyo hasi ni yeong-gwang-eul bad-eusoseo gyeolko geuleohge malhaji anihaess-eumyeo geuleohge hal gwon lido eobsnaida jega geuleohge malhayeossdamyeon dangsinkkeseo algo gyesilgeos-ibnida dangsin-eun jeoui simjung-eul asina jeoneun dangsin-ui simjung-eul moleunani dangsin-eun sumgyeojin geosdo asineun bun-isibnida
